product_name: Lowa S-Crown GTX Mesh Trail-Running Shoes - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: All-season shoes built wth Gore-Tex(R) waterproof, breathable membranes, the women's Lowa S-Crown GTX Mesh trail-running shoes offer dry protection on wet and muddy trails. Gore-Tex waterproof linings keep your feet dry and comfortable by protecting them from the elements and maintaining breathability. Patented "STG", soft-to-ground midsoles provide the correct combination of shock absorption, targeted cushioning, stability and grip. Floating tongue construction fits close-to-the-foot and self-adjusts for superb fit. Elastic Gore-tex protection over the insteps eliminates gusset wrinkles. Ortholite footbeds; bi-density EVA midsoles with polyurethane inserts for stability. Rubber outsoles on Lowa S-Trail GTX Mesh trail-running shoes for women offer traction on varied terrain. Closeout.
short_description: All-season shoes built wth Gore-Tex(R) waterproof, breathable membranes, the women's Lowa S-Crown GTX Mesh trail-running shoes offer dry protection on wet and muddy trails.
